meanings.definition: A group of living organisms consisting of similar individuals capable of interbreeding.
meanings.sent1: There are many different species of birds in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The zoo has a diverse collection of animal species.
meanings.sent3: The species of fish in the aquarium were having a party.
meanings.sent4: The species of flowers in the garden danced in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied a new species of insects found in the rainforest.

meanings.definition: A category of biological classification ranking below a genus and above a subspecies.
meanings.sent1: The biologist classified the new species of plants.
meanings.sent2: The endangered species need protection to survive.
meanings.sent3: The species of bacteria were having a race under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The species of stars in the galaxy twinkled brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a rare species of dinosaur fossil.
